class.rdfs:comment: The act of notifying an event organizer as to whether you expect to attend the event.
class.rdfs:label: RsvpAction

schema:additionalNumberOfGuests.rdfs:comment: If responding yes, the number of guests who will attend in addition to the invitee.
schema:additionalNumberOfGuests.rdfs:label: additionalNumberOfGuests

schema:rsvpResponse.rdfs:comment: The response (yes, no, maybe) to the RSVP.
schema:rsvpResponse.rdfs:label: rsvpResponse
